remarks: Express composition of two functions as a maps-to applying both in sequence.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Oct-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)
statement:
fcompt $p |- ( ( A : D --> E /\ B : C --> D ) -> ( A o. B ) = ( x e. C |-> ( A ` ( B ` x ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d E x $.
